import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../Styles/Shared/CartMenu.scss"; import CloseIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Close"; import MyButton from "./MyButton"; import cartItem1 from "../../Assets/cartItem1.png"; import cartItem2 from "../../Assets/cartItem2.png"; import DeleteForeverOutlinedIcon from "@material-ui/icons/DeleteForeverOutlined"; import { IconButton } from "@material-ui/core"; function CartMenu({ closeFunction }) { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [quantity2, setQuantity2] = useState(1); return (

Your Shopping Cart

War Arena: Titan Wars

Games

setQuantity(quantity - 1)}> -

{quantity}

setQuantity(quantity + 1)}> +

72$

Glymber

Games

setQuantity2(quantity2 - 1)}> -

{quantity2}

setQuantity2(quantity2 + 1)}> +

56$

Subtotal

104.57$

Taxes

23.43$

Shipping

0.00$

Total

128$
); } export default CartMenu;
